hero.title: Hi, my name is
hero.subtitle: I build incredible websites and apps.
hero.description: I'm a front-end web developer and Computer Systems Engineer who enjoys creating fantastic concepts and digital experiences for the web.

projects.description_morty: A web application that consumes the Rick and Morty API. Includes search bar, pagination, filters, and dynamic routing.
projects.description_ag3: Meet this web application created to book tourist transportation services in the city of Cancun.
projects.description_olympia: Website to find accommodation options, including hotels and resorts. He helped me put into practice what I learned in React.
projects.description_medicom: This website contains the most important data of a hospital, such as its trajectory, the medical departments and the team of doctors.
projects.description_todos: Web application built in React to be able to create, complete and delete TODOs using data persistence with localStorage.
projects.description_interio: Web project where I put into practice all the skills I have acquired in layout and also the optimization of elements.
projects.description_fylo: Develop this webpage to meet a Frontend Mentor challenge about a cloud storage application.
projects.description_uniqlo: A simple and minimalist website that simulates a virtual store. I put into practice the animation of elements using ScrollReveal.
projects.description_motosport: Web page that includes different data on sports motorcycles. Personally, it was the project that I enjoyed building the most.
projects.description_patronis: One of the first websites I built using Bootstrap. I learned a lot about the grid system.
